original_title: UFOs & Aliens: The Search for Truth
overview: Narrated by Jeri Ryan of Star Trek, Voyager, this video features stunning visualizations and interviews with top experts in the field of science, technology and ufology including Jill Tarter, inspiration for the book and film, Contact. First broadcast on The Learning Channel, UFOs and Aliens provides an exciting examination of UFO sightings, alien encounters, and our efforts to contact extraterrestrial life in interstellar space. Part 1-Making Contact. An extraordinary new look at the search for extraterrestrial life. Part 2-Alien Life Forms. People all over the world claim to have had close encounters with extraterrestrials. Follow the experts as they delve into the possibilities. Part 3-Saucer Tech. Ion propulsion, zero-point gravity, antimatter, gravity manipulation-a glimpse into the unknown of UFO's. Extra Features- UFOs vs. the U.S. Government. Real Encounters.. Aliens in Antiquity.
title: UFOs & Aliens: The Search for Truth
